columns.class_id: The unique identifier for each class.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the enrolled student.
columns.teacher_id: The unique identifier of the instructor for the class.
columns.class_details: The specific subject or content covered in the class.

Classes.table_description: The table manages class information for students and instructors.

columns.student_address_id: The unique identifier for each student address record.
columns.address_id: The unique identifier for the associated address.
columns.address_type_code: The code defining the type of address such as home or company.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the student associated with the address.
columns.date_from: The starting date when the address became effective.
columns.date_to: The ending date when the address is no longer effective.

Students_Addresses.table_description: The table records addresses associated with each student.

columns.detention_id: The unique identifier for each detention record.
columns.detention_type_code: The code defining the type of detention assigned.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the student involved in the detention.
columns.datetime_detention_start: The date and time when the detention begins.
columns.datetime_detention_end: The date and time when the detention ends.
columns.detention_summary: The summary of the reasons for the detention.
columns.other_details: Additional notes or information related to the detention.

Detention.table_description: The table tracks detention records for students and related details.

columns.achievement_id: The unique identifier for each achievement record.
columns.achievement_type_code: The code specifying the category of achievement.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the student who attained the achievement.
columns.date_achievement: The date when the achievement was awarded.
columns.achievement_details: The description of the specific achievement received.
columns.other_details: Additional information related to the achievement.

Achievements.table_description: The table records achievements attained by students and related details.

columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.bio_data: The name of the student as recorded in the database.
columns.student_details: The address or location details of the student.

Students.table_description: The table maintains records of student identities and their corresponding details.

columns.transcript_id: The unique identifier for each transcript record.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the associated student.
columns.date_of_transcript: The date when the transcript was issued.
columns.transcript_details: The summary of the student's performance on the transcript.

Transcripts.table_description: The table records transcripts issued for students and their performance details.

columns.behaviour_monitoring_id: The unique identifier for each behaviour monitoring record.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the student being monitored.
columns.behaviour_monitoring_details: The specific details of the monitored behaviour.

Behaviour_Monitoring.table_description: The table tracks behaviour monitoring records for students.

columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address.
columns.address_details: The specific location details for the address.

Addresses.table_description: The table maintains address information for use in student records.

columns.event_type_code: The unique code defining each event type.
columns.event_type_description: The detailed description of the event type.

Ref_Event_Types.table_description: The table holds reference information about different event types.

columns.achievement_type_code: The unique code for each type of achievement.
columns.achievement_type_description: The detailed description of each achievement type.

Ref_Achievement_Type.table_description: The table stores types of achievements defined for student records.

columns.address_type_code: The unique code for each type of address.
columns.address_type_description: The detailed description of the address type.

Ref_Address_Types.table_description: The table defines types of addresses for students' records.

columns.detention_type_code: The unique code defining each type of detention.
columns.detention_type_description: The detailed description of the specific detention type.

Ref_Detention_Type.table_description: The table provides reference information for different types of detentions.

columns.event_id: The unique identifier for each event record.
columns.event_type_code: The code defining the type of event recorded.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the student associated with the event.
columns.event_date: The date and time when the event occurred.
columns.other_details: Additional information related to the event.

Student_Events.table_description: The table records events associated with students and their details.

columns.teacher_id: The unique identifier for each teacher.
columns.teacher_details: The name of the teacher as recorded in the database.

Teachers.table_description: The table maintains records of teacher identities and their details.

columns.student_loan_id: The unique identifier for each student loan record.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier of the student receiving the loan.
columns.date_of_loan: The date when the loan was issued to the student.
columns.amount_of_loan: The total amount of money lent to the student.
columns.other_details: Additional information about the loan that may be relevant.

Student_Loans.table_description: The table tracks loans issued to students and associated details.
